title: [Client] Recently bought Poro Icon isn't showing up after purchase
body: I bought the Artist Poro Icon a few days ago and it hasn't shown up in my inventory. I sent a request to Riot about the issue and was told to post here about it. According to "Queen of Blades", it's a visual bug in my client. Not really sure what to do at this point. I asked if I could just get a refund for the amount of RP I spent, but I was told that I have no more refunds. I feel like if nothing else works, I should be able to get a refund for the icon.

replies.body:
Hey NeverMeltIce,

Since these were originally made available for another region's art contest, they'll be located a bit further down in your list of icons. (I actually had to hunt them down myself when I first grabbed them.)

http://imgur.com/3II5e9J

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=QNjssEME,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-01-25T17:46:14.288+0000)
>
> http://imgur.com/3II5e9J

Whoa, Katey, that icon scrollbar though. Do you really have every single icon???? O.o Damn lol
Not all, but I have a collection stemming from 2010. WizardCrab has like 400+.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=QNjssEME,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2016-01-25T20:15:48.224+0000)
>
> Not all, but I have a collection stemming from 2010. WizardCrab has like 400+.

Holy wow, omg. That must be pretty nice, and also a pain to look for a certain one in that giant mess.
It's hard to pick one. D:
Oh wow! There it is! I feel so silly, thanks so much for responding!
